decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 20315/APP/2024/1119 dated 28-06-2024, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on plan references:
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2 which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 20315/APP/2024/1119 dated 28-06-2024, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been SUPERSEDED:
The following plans have been APPROVED:
description: Non material amendment to planning permission 20315/APP/2024/1119 dated 28-06-2024 (Erection of single storey extensions to the rear and side Extension and upgrade roof of existing utility room) to install two additional side facing windows and one additional front facing window.
